item.description:

Im trying to add a Book of items. i have the void added

public void DragonMenu() { sendQuest("Custom Items List", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Item Name - Item Number", 8147); sendQuest("Dragon Med - 1149", 8148); sendQuest("Dragon Sq Shield - 1187", 8149); sendQuest("Dragon LongSword - 1305", 8150); sendQuest("Dragon BattleAxe - 1377", 8151); sendQuest("Dragon Mace - 1434", 8152); sendQuest("Dragon Boots - 2904", 8153); sendQuest("Dragon ChainBody - 3140", 8154); sendQuest("Dragon Halberd - 1305", 8155); sendQuest("Dragon Platelegs - 1305", 8156); sendQuest("Dragon PlateSkirt - 1305", 8157); sendQuest("Dragon LongSword - 1305", 8158); sendQuest("Dragon Scimitar - 4587", 8159); sendQuest("Dragon 2h Sword - 7158", 8160); sendQuest("Dragon Axe - 6739", 8161); sendQuest("Dragon Dagger - 1215", 8162); sendQuest("Dragon Dagger(p) - 1231", 8163); sendQuest("Dragon Dagger(+) - 5680", 8164); sendQuest("Dragon Dagger(S) - 5698", 8165); sendQuest("Dragon Spear - 1249", 8166); sendQuest("Dragon Spear(p) - 1263", 8167); sendQuest("Dragon Spear(+) - 5716", 8168); sendQuest("Dragon Spear(S) - 5730", 8169); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

but i dont know how to add it so when i click the book the menu opens Please post how i can do this or even post a link[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2008, 06:10:45 AM[/size][hr]Also the item number is 8000 and the book is custom but i cant figure out how to get this working. i have made it tradeable ,and sellable. and it is only 5 coins to buy it.
